title: Empire TV Tycoon v1.21 [Both 32bit and 64bit] repack Mr DJ
description:
Title: Empire TV Tycoon v1.2.1
 Genre: Casual, Indie, Simulation, Strategy
 Developer: Dreamsite Games
 Publisher: Dreamsite Games 
 Release Date: 20 Oct, 2015

Languages : English , German and Espanol ;

About This Game

 Empire TV Tycoon is a game for PC, Mac, and Linux in which you manage a TV channel and fight for audiences taking decisions that will project your channel to fame and fortune.You will decide the content of your channel, select advertisers, hire workers, make your own productions, hire actors, and engage in much more activities! It's inspired by games such as Mad TV, Mud TV, and other movie management games, with a modern approach on how to produce custom content such as movies or tv-shows.

 Empire TV is a big corporation having serious losses, and It can't afford to maintain three channels, but only one, any longer. You have been hired to lead one of the channels to achieve fame and be the one that remains.

 Cut Microsoft Redistributables files like dotnet and XNA , if u need it , geab them from my previous release which u already have

 System Requirements

 Minimum:
 OS: Windows XP
 Memory: 1024 MB RAM
 DirectX: Version 9.0
 Hard Drive: 200 MB available space 

 Requirements:
 - Microsoft(R) Visual C++ 2010 Runtime (x86)
 -.NET Framework 4 (SSELauncher only)

 Note: Both 32bit and 64 bit windows supported 

 Empire TV Tycoon 1.2.1 [Hotfix for savegames]

 Weâ€™ve made some changes to the save/load system in order to fix the problem with the corrupted savegame bug that appeared with the 1.2.0 version in some situations. Current broke savegames will not work still but the bug is not expected to come back. 

 Also, weâ€™ve introduced points of restoration so if something similar happens again you will only lose minutes of gameplay instead of the full savegame.


**INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS:

Open Empire TV Tycoon v1.21.exe , wait for a bit for the self extractor to open, specify the directory where u want to extract the game folder, open the extracted folder and play.....
 OR
Extarct it yourself using 'WinRAR'

Launch SmartSteamLoader.exe and not the game executable EmpireTV.exe ...

Always open the game using run as administrator
